blogs.title: The Evolution of JavaScript
blogs.author: Alex Carter
blogs.body: JavaScript has transformed from a simple scripting language to a powerful tool for building modern web applications. This blog explores its journey from Netscape to Node.js.

blogs.title: Understanding Matrix Factorization
blogs.author: Dr. Priya Kapoor
blogs.body: Matrix Factorization is a core concept in recommendation systems. This post simplifies the math and dives into practical applications in collaborative filtering.

blogs.title: 5 Tips for Better Photography
blogs.author: Liam Jackson
blogs.body: Whether you're a beginner or a pro, these 5 tips can help you capture stunning photos. From lighting to composition, learn how to take your skills to the next level.

blogs.title: Mastering Time Management
blogs.author: Sophia Lee
blogs.body: Time management is essential in todayâ€™s fast-paced world. Discover strategies to prioritize your tasks and achieve a better work-life balance.

blogs.title: A Beginner's Guides
blogs.author: Ravi Sharma
blogs.body: Session-based recommendations focus on the context of a user session. This guide explains the basics and offers practical examples to get you started.
